text:
It would be useful to make Clear All command clean contents of LogViewer as this component is used for debuging, you would typically :
- Run a script in error
- Find error using LogViewer
- Fix error
- Clean LogViewer
- Check no more error in LogViewer
creator: p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com
p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com
